bug.author: vishalbollu
bug.summary: Tags are not propagated to API log groups
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
Tags specified in cluster configuration are not propagated to API log groups because API log groups are created by FluentD. <denchmark-h:h4>Suggested solution</denchmark-h>
explore ways to add tags to log groups created by FluentD create log groups upon API creation in operator
